manage app settings: Manage your application settings and configurations to tailor your experience.
select category manage settings: Select a category from the sidebar to manage specific application settings.
configure app settings description: Here you can configure various aspects of your application, from organization details to user management and security.
explore settings navigation left: Explore the settings categories using the navigation on the left to customize your portal.
no roles found: No roles found. Define new roles to manage user permissions.
start by creating new role: You can start by creating a new role.
no audit logs found: No audit logs found. User activity logs will appear here.
activity logs appear here: Activity logs will appear here as users interact with the system, providing a record of changes.
add extra layer security: Add an extra layer of security to your account with 2FA.
requires verification code: Requires a verification code from your phone or authenticator app for login.
update password set new: Update your password or set a new one to maintain account security.
see where logged in: See where you are currently logged in and manage active sessions.
advanced security settings here: Advanced security settings and configurations will be available here.
control email notifications: Control which email notifications you receive for various events.
receive email new issue: Receive an email when a new issue is reported in your building or assigned to you.
get emails announcements: Get emails for important building announcements and updates.
receive reminders bill due dates: Receive reminders for upcoming bill due dates and payment confirmations.
control sms notifications: Control which SMS notifications you receive for critical updates.
receive critical alerts sms: Receive critical alerts via SMS for immediate awareness of emergencies.
get sms maintenance work: Get SMS updates for maintenance work affecting your unit or property.
manage org general info: Manage your organization's general information, including name, address, and contact details.
help improve suggestions: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts, suggestions, or reporting issues.
subject: Subject
no buildings found: No buildings found. Add your first building to manage properties.
start by adding new building: You can start by adding a new building to your portfolio.
no units found: No units found. Add new units to your buildings.
start by adding new unit: You can start by adding a new unit to a building.
no users found: No users found. Add new users to grant access to the platform.
start by adding new user: You can start by adding a new user to the system.
manage all properties portfolio: Manage all properties within your portfolio, tracking their performance and details.
portfolio managed here: Your property portfolio will be managed here, providing a centralized overview.
add first property: Add your first property to the portfolio.
track manage visitor access: Track and manage visitor access to the property, ensuring security and record-keeping.
visitor logs managed here: Visitor logs will be managed here, providing a history of all entries and exits.
feedback submitted description: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
